output_list.criticism: The transfer and transferFrom functions have an integer overflow. This can lead to incorrect calculations and potentially loss of funds.
The implementation of transfer and transferFrom has incorrect logic, allowing attackers to steal tokens. This can lead to loss of funds.
The random set used in transfer and transferFrom is bad and can be exploited. This allows attackers to steal tokens. Integer overflow in the random set is a potential vulnerability.
The contract allows unauthorized users to access and modify contract data. This can lead to loss of funds.
The contract has a typo where 'supply' is used as a function name, which allows unauthorized users to create arbitrary tokens. This can lead to loss of funds.
The token balance is not a reliable indicator of the actual balance of the user's tokens. This can lead to loss of funds.
